article.title: Nova Technologies Wins Contract for SOF RAPTOR II Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Nova Technologies has been awarded a $49 million contract for designing, developing, testing, integrating, installing, documenting and delivering the Special Operations Forces Requirements Analysis, Prototyping, Training, Operations and Rehearsal II (SOF RAPTOR II) in support of the U.S. Special Operations Command.
